channel.title: AppLocker on SerializingMe
channel.description: Recent content in AppLocker on SerializingMe

item.title: Updated AppLocker Dump Script
item.description: I have created a new version of this script so that it is better aligned with the conventions I use for other PowerShell scripts.

item.title: Inspecting AppLocker Policy
item.description: While doing incident response, if AppLocker is being used but the computer still got infected by a malicious executable, it is useful to know exactly what AppLocker policy is currently applied.
